name: Peachy's Moonlight Journey
description:
Submitted for Ludwig Jam 2021

How To Play:

  • A / D - Move Left / Right
  • Click and Drag - Jump
  • Escape - Pause
  • Mouse / Left Click - Menu Navigation

Credits:

  • Programming +  Game Design: Cody Selman  (Twitch, Twitter, Itch)
  • Art: AJ Norman (Twitch, Twitter)
  • Sound Design + Music: Jeff Alvarez (Website)
